name: Med Study AI
description: A web app that helps medical students study for their exams by providing study notes, recall flashcards, and USMLE style questions.

name: Martel Assassins
description: App to organize the annual Assassins game at Martel College of Rice University, where players compete to be the last one standing.

name: Zetamac Player
description: A python Selenium app that automatically plays the Zetamac arithmetic game with extreme accuracy and speed.
